sen.j: 梅若六郎（うめわか ろくろう）とは、シテ方観世流の一派、梅若家の当主が用いる名。
sen.e: Rokuro UMEWAKA is a name used by the headman of the Umewaka family, which is one of the shite-kata (actors who play leading characters in Noh performances) Kanze school groups.
Rokuro UMEWAKA is a name used by the headman of the Umewaka family, which is one of the shite-kata (actors who play leading characters in Noh performances) Kanze school groups.
Rokuro UMEWAKA is a name used by the headman of the Umewaka family, which is one of the shite-kata (actors who play leading characters in Noh performances) Kanze school groups.

sen.j: 当代の梅若六郎は梅若六郎 (56世)。
sen.e: The current Rokuro UMEWAKA is the 56th generation.

He succeeded to this name in 1988.

sen.j: 梅若六郎 (52世) （1828年（文政11年） - 1909年（明治42年）） ：初代梅若実
sen.e: Rokuro UMEWAKA the 52nd (1828 - 1909): Minoru UMEWAKA the first

sen.e: Rokuro UMEWAKA the 54th (1878 - 1959): Minoru UMEWAKA the second

sen.j: 梅若六郎 (56世) （1948年（昭和23年） -）（2代目梅若玄祥）
sen.e: Rokuro UMEWAKA the 56th (1948 - present) (Gensho UMEWAKA the second)
